PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/> PREFIX fhd: <http://vivo.fredhutch.org/ontology/display#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?training ?trainingName ?dateTimeStart ?dateTimeEnd WHERE { ?subject ?property ?training . ?training a fhd:Training . ?training rdfs:label ?trainingName . OPTIONAL { ?subject ?property ?training . ?training core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . ?dateTimeInterval core:start ?dateTimeStartValue . ?dateTimeStartValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeStart . } OPTIONAL { ?subject ?property ?training . ?training core:dateTimeInterval ?dateTimeInterval . ?dateTimeInterval core:end ?dateTimeEndValue . ?dateTimeEndValue core:dateTime ?dateTimeEnd . } } ORDER BY DESC(?dateTimeEnd)
